name: The Riddles of the Sphinx (GeistPolter)
description:
A small game made for a class using the game engine Bitsy Game Maker, found here on itch.io: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

The Riddles of the Sphinx is a small puzzle game where you play as a soul in limbo and must solve 3 riddles in order to determine whether you live or die.

Features:

  • 3-5 minutes of gameplay
  • 4 rooms to explore
  • 2 endings
  • A talkative sphinx
  • A friendly little dog
  • More memes than are necessary
